Title: Ladyspo
Description: ['A science-fiction comedy where various pro sports bounty hunters fight each other in sporting events. The story centers on Arigetti, Korupi, and Sabina, three women in a team who participate in various sports.']
Staff: [['Kimura, Hiroshi', 'Director, Script, Storyboard, Series Composition'], ['Shibata, Katsutoshi', 'Sound Director'], ['Kusuda, Aina', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Kanayama, Keisei', 'Editing']]
